actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.
Subcommittee on Energy and Agricultural Taxation. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-947.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Agricultural Taxation

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal capital gains tax on disposition of investments in United States real property by foreign countries.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the capital gains tax on disposition of investments in U.S. real property by foreign citizens. Repeals the special reporting requirements with respect to U.S. real property interests.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal capital gains tax on disposition of investments in United States real property by foreign countries.
